resources.string:
<html>
            <head>
                <style type="text/css">
                @font-face {
                    font-family: MyFont;
                    src: url("myfont.otf")
                }
                body {
                    font-family: MyFont;
                    font-size: small;
                    text-align: justify;
                }
                </style>
            </head>
            <body style="text-align:justify;color:black;">
                Acumen Modular Furniture, as a company, is involved in manufacturing of modular furnitures for offices, residences and modular kitchens. Acumen, as a manufacturer for modular furniture has changed the typical tag of ready-made furniture and has made it customized. Our ability is to become #1 selling brand in residential and office furniture through quality, customization and service.</br></br>With over 12 years of experience, our product portfolio is extensive and comprehensive. We have numerous products ranging from workstations to executive desks in office furniture and a wide range to choose from beds to living room units for residences.\n\nAcumen also provides turnkey execution of Corporate, Residential and Commercial Interiors. At Acumen, we provide a mix of traditional carpentry and trendy modular solutions to its clients.</br></br>Acumen provides all types of material as per need like commercial plywood, particle board, MDF etc. Depending on the requirement, one can choose from wide variety of material,finishes,accessories.
            </body>
        </html>
